DOC.brief_title: Creating Comfortable Cafeteria : Staff Student Feedback - Outcome Study ( Cafeteria Prog )
DOC.detailed_description: A mixed method design use explore outcomes 6-week , occupational therapy-led Comfortable Cafeteria program design build capacity cafeteria supervisor create positive mealtime environment student successfully participate enjoy meal socialization peer . Statistically significant improvement pretest posttest visual analogue scale rating participation enjoyment student low mid-range score outset find . Cafeteria supervisor demonstrate statistically significant improvement perception knowledge skill supervise encourage healthy eating base pretest posttest rating . Qualitative finding add insight program suggesting student learn prosocial value ( e.g . kind , help others ) , supervisor actively encourage positive social interaction , occupational therapy practitioner enjoy implement Comfortable Cafeteria program recognize positive supervisor student change result integrate service cafeteria .
DOC.criteria: Students participate lunch particular grade Cafeteria supervisor child Students parental consent Students parental consent
